property.value: Jagged-Scar Archers's power and toughness are each equal to the number of Elves you control. {T}: Jagged-Scar Archers deals damage equal to its power to target creature with flying.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {G}, {T}: Target attacking creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The kith dance their elaborate reels not merely to celebrate the events of their lives but to form an unbreakable bond of loyalty with their kin, a bond stronger than the fear of death itself.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever an attacking Kithkin or Elf is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, you may draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Eidren's hunts are dangerous affairs. All dread the inevitable recounting of those who died while flushing out his prey.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gains deathtouch until end of turn. (Any amount of damage it deals to a creature is enough to destroy that creature.) Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Which is more filled with poison: the flower of the moonglove or the minds of elves?" - Vessifrus, flamekin demagogue

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose a card name, then target player mills a card. If a card with the chosen name was milled this way, you gain life equal to its mana value. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A ribbon torn will ward away dark dreams."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Eidren, perfect of Lys Alana, ordered hundreds of trees uprooted and rearranged into a pattern he deemed beautiful. Thus the Gilt-Leaf Wood was born.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature is a Treefolk with base power and toughness 0/4 and loses all abilities.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Bulgo paused, puzzled. What was that rustling sound, and why did he feel so stiff? And how could his feet be so thirsty?

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you cast an Elf spell, you may create a 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: From the highest tiers of Dawn's Light Palace to the deepest shade of Wren's Run, the silver notes of the horn shimmer through the air, and all who hear it feel its pull.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Masked Admirers enters the battlefield, draw a card. Whenever you cast a creature spell, you may pay {G}{G}. If you do, return Masked Admirers from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Beauty determines value, and we determine beauty."

property.name: Rules
property.value: All creatures able to block Nath's Elite do so. When Nath's Elite enters the battlefield, clash with an opponent. If you win, put a +1/+1 counter on Nath's Elite. (Each clashing player reveals the top card of their library, then puts that card on the top or bottom. A player wins if their card had a higher mana value.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Roam as you will, your roots remain in the strong earth of your Rising."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose two - • Target player gains 7 life. • Put target noncreature permanent on top of its owner's library. • Target player shuffles their graveyard into their library. • Search your library for a creature card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target noncreature permanent. If you control a Treefolk, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "All the sylvan secrets of this world are etched between my rings. The skinfolk's metal aberrations can rot between my roots." - Colfenor, the Last Yew

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "May you shade three generations of seedlings."

property.name: Rules

property.value: Whenever you clash and win, you may draw a card. (This ability triggers after the clash ends.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It takes a huntmaster's eye to discern the contours of mythical prey.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If one can associate any virtue with the eyeblights, it is the talent some achieve in disposing of them. I have seen the slaying of boggarts raised nearly to an art form." - Fiala, Gilt-Leaf winnower

property.value: Changeling (This card is every creature type.)

property.value: Changelings cannot resist the draw of a new shape, even if doing so would be in their best interests.
